name: Urban Ninja
description:
What's better than ninjas, heroes and Frenchmen?

All of the three things combined of course!
Meet Francois, a chubby Ninja Hero with a French accent.

Join him in a wall climbing, roof jumping adventure as a SECRET AGENT.
Wrapped in a tight latex suit, he's ready to take on a list of classified missions entrusted him by his agency.

Can you handle the dangerous rope swinging, pole sliding and acrobatics required to survive 60 breath-taking missions?

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

WHAT REVIEWERS SAY:

- iPild.de: "Gameplay 20 / 20"
- iTunes US: "New & Noteworthy", Oct 2010
- App Store SE: "Hot New Game", Oct 2010
- Touch Arcade: "It wouldn't surprise me if I went back and ran the numbers that Donut Games is responsible for more favorable game reviews than any other developer"
- GamePro: Score 4.5 / 5.0 in "App Store Games of the Week"

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

GAME FEATURES:

- Jump, sneak, climb and slide your way through various locations
- 60 classified missions
- BONUS GAME: Ninja Slide
- BONUS GAME: Bubble Ride
- LIFESAVERS: Helps you pass difficult levels and get higher scores
- Donut Games' famous 3-star ranking system: Increased replay value!
- Achievements to unlock and collect
- Collectors Icon #23
- And so much more...

TECH FEATURES:

- Game Center support
- Widescreen support
- Universal App (iPad, iPhone, iPod Touch)

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

Enjoy another Donut Games release!
